64#ifndef _NETINET_IP6_H_
65#define _NETINET_IP6_H_
66
67/*
68 * Definition for internet protocol version 6.
69 * RFC 2460
70 */
71
72struct ip6_hdr {
73 union {
74 struct ip6_hdrctl {
75 uint32_t ip6_un1_flow; /* 20 bits of flow-ID */
76 uint16_t ip6_un1_plen; /* payload length */
77 uint8_t ip6_un1_nxt; /* next header */
78 uint8_t ip6_un1_hlim; /* hop limit */
79 } ip6_un1;
80 uint8_t ip6_un2_vfc; /* 4 bits version, top 4 bits class */
81 } ip6_ctlun;
82 struct in6_addr ip6_src; /* source address */
83 struct in6_addr ip6_dst; /* destination address */
84} UNALIGNED;
85
86#define ip6_vfc ip6_ctlun.ip6_un2_vfc
87#define IP6_VERSION(ip6_hdr) (((ip6_hdr)->ip6_vfc & 0xf0) >> 4)
88#define ip6_flow ip6_ctlun.ip6_un1.ip6_un1_flow
89#define ip6_plen ip6_ctlun.ip6_un1.ip6_un1_plen
90#define ip6_nxt ip6_ctlun.ip6_un1.ip6_un1_nxt
91#define ip6_hlim ip6_ctlun.ip6_un1.ip6_un1_hlim
92#define ip6_hops ip6_ctlun.ip6_un1.ip6_un1_hlim
93
94/* in network endian */
95#define IPV6_FLOWINFO_MASK ((uint32_t)htonl(0x0fffffff)) /* flow info (28 bits) */
96#define IPV6_FLOWLABEL_MASK ((uint32_t)htonl(0x000fffff)) /* flow label (20 bits) */
97#if 1
98/* ECN bits proposed by Sally Floyd */
99#define IP6TOS_CE 0x01 /* congestion experienced */
100#define IP6TOS_ECT 0x02 /* ECN-capable transport */
101#endif
102
103/*
104 * Extension Headers
105 */
106
107struct ip6_ext {
108 uint8_t ip6e_nxt;
109 uint8_t ip6e_len;
110} UNALIGNED;
111
112/* Hop-by-Hop options header */
113struct ip6_hbh {
114 uint8_t ip6h_nxt; /* next header */
115 uint8_t ip6h_len; /* length in units of 8 octets */
116 /* followed by options */
117} UNALIGNED;
118
119/* Destination options header */
120struct ip6_dest {
121 uint8_t ip6d_nxt; /* next header */
122 uint8_t ip6d_len; /* length in units of 8 octets */
123 /* followed by options */
124} UNALIGNED;
125
126/* http://www.iana.org/assignments/ipv6-parameters/ipv6-parameters.xhtml */
127
128/* Option types and related macros */
129#define IP6OPT_PAD1 0x00 /* 00 0 00000 */
130#define IP6OPT_PADN 0x01 /* 00 0 00001 */
131#define IP6OPT_JUMBO 0xC2 /* 11 0 00010 = 194 */
132#define IP6OPT_JUMBO_LEN 6
133#define IP6OPT_RPL 0x63 /* 01 1 00011 */
134#define IP6OPT_TUN_ENC_LIMIT 0x04 /* 00 0 00100 */
135#define IP6OPT_ROUTER_ALERT 0x05 /* 00 0 00101 */
136
137#define IP6OPT_RTALERT_LEN 4
138#define IP6OPT_RTALERT_MLD 0 /* Datagram contains an MLD message */
139#define IP6OPT_RTALERT_RSVP 1 /* Datagram contains an RSVP message */
140#define IP6OPT_RTALERT_ACTNET 2 /* contains an Active Networks msg */
141#define IP6OPT_MINLEN 2
142
143#define IP6OPT_QUICK_START 0x26 /* 00 1 00110 */
144#define IP6OPT_CALIPSO 0x07 /* 00 0 00111 */
145#define IP6OPT_SMF_DPD 0x08 /* 00 0 01000 */
146#define IP6OPT_HOME_ADDRESS 0xc9 /* 11 0 01001 */
147#define IP6OPT_HOMEADDR_MINLEN 18
148#define IP6OPT_EID 0x8a /* 10 0 01010 */
149#define IP6OPT_ILNP_NOTICE 0x8b /* 10 0 01011 */
150#define IP6OPT_LINE_ID 0x8c /* 10 0 01100 */
151#define IP6OPT_MPL 0x6d /* 01 1 01101 */
152#define IP6OPT_IP_DFF 0xee /* 11 1 01110 */
153
154#define IP6OPT_TYPE(o) ((o) & 0xC0)
155#define IP6OPT_TYPE_SKIP 0x00
156#define IP6OPT_TYPE_DISCARD 0x40
157#define IP6OPT_TYPE_FORCEICMP 0x80
158#define IP6OPT_TYPE_ICMP 0xC0
159
160#define IP6OPT_MUTABLE 0x20
161
162/* Routing header */
163struct ip6_rthdr {
164 uint8_t ip6r_nxt; /* next header */
165 uint8_t ip6r_len; /* length in units of 8 octets */
166 uint8_t ip6r_type; /* routing type */
167 uint8_t ip6r_segleft; /* segments left */
168 /* followed by routing type specific data */
169} UNALIGNED;
170
171#define IPV6_RTHDR_TYPE_0 0
172#define IPV6_RTHDR_TYPE_2 2
173
174/* Type 0 Routing header */
175/* Also used for Type 2 */
176struct ip6_rthdr0 {
177 nd_uint8_t ip6r0_nxt; /* next header */
178 nd_uint8_t ip6r0_len; /* length in units of 8 octets */
179 nd_uint8_t ip6r0_type; /* always zero */
180 nd_uint8_t ip6r0_segleft; /* segments left */
181 nd_uint32_t ip6r0_reserved; /* reserved field */
182 struct in6_addr ip6r0_addr[1]; /* up to 23 addresses */
183};
184
185/* Fragment header */
186struct ip6_frag {
187 uint8_t ip6f_nxt; /* next header */
188 uint8_t ip6f_reserved; /* reserved field */
189 uint16_t ip6f_offlg; /* offset, reserved, and flag */
190 uint32_t ip6f_ident; /* identification */
191} UNALIGNED;
192
193#define IP6F_OFF_MASK 0xfff8 /* mask out offset from ip6f_offlg */
194#define IP6F_RESERVED_MASK 0x0006 /* reserved bits in ip6f_offlg */
195#define IP6F_MORE_FRAG 0x0001 /* more-fragments flag */
196
197#endif /* not _NETINET_IP6_H_ */
198
